de.adorsys.datasafe.encrypiton.impl.document

Class CMSDocumentWriteService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.adorsys.datasafe.encrypiton.impl.document.CMSDocumentWriteService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncryptedDocumentWriteService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CMSDocumentWriteServiceRuntimeDelegatable

    public class CMSDocumentWriteService
extends Object
implements EncryptedDocumentWriteService
    Writes CMS-encrypted document to DFS.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public OutputStream write(Map<PublicKeyIDWithPublicKey,AbsoluteLocation> recipientsWithInbox)
        Description copied from interface: EncryptedDocumentWriteService
        Writes and encrypts data using public key cryptography, so that only private key owner can read it. Supports sharing with multiple users, so that encrypted copy will be written to each recipient and he can read it using his private key.
        Specified by:
        write in interface EncryptedDocumentWriteService
        Parameters:
        recipientsWithInbox - Map of (recipient public key - recipients' inbox) of users with whom to share file.
        Returns:
        Sink where you can send unencrypted data that will be encrypted and stored

      • write

        public OutputStream write(WithCallback<AbsoluteLocation<PrivateResource>,ResourceWriteCallback> locationWithCallback,
                          SecretKeyIDWithKey secretKey)
        Description copied from interface: EncryptedDocumentWriteService
        Writes and encrypts data using symmetric cryptography.
        Specified by:
        write in interface EncryptedDocumentWriteService
        Parameters:
        locationWithCallback - Where to write data with callbacks to notify
        secretKey - Secret key and its ID to encrypt with
        Returns:
        Sink where you can send unencrypted data that will be encrypted and stored
